tips.text:
Creating a new store and need some sample products? 
Try the populate command: https://shopify.github.io/shopify-app-cli/app/rails/commands/#populate
Did you know the Shopify CLI is open source? Get involved and learn how to contribute: https://github.com/Shopify/shopify-app-cli
New to ngrok.io? Learn all about it here: https://www.shopify.ca/partners/blog/shopify-admin-authenticate-app
Remember to keep your API updated! Read more about the latest release: https://shopify.dev/concepts/about-apis/versioning
Did you know we release a new API version every quarter? Read more about API deprecation: https://www.shopify.ca/partners/blog/api-deprecation-update-2020-10
How to Get Reviews for Your Shopify Apps: https://www.shopify.ca/partners/blog/get-reviews-for-your-shopify-apps
Save design time by using pre-styled React components with Polaris, already available to you in your app scaffold! https://polaris.shopify.com
Expedite your app review process by considering accessibility from the start with Polaris https://polaris.shopify.com/foundations/accessibility
Reminder to keep your requested scopes limited to only what you need
Learn about all the awesome features of the CLI here: https://shopify.github.io/shopify-app-cli/
Keep up to date with changes to the Shopify platform @ https://shopify.dev/changelog
Check out our Partners Slack and Facebook group
